body.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<alto xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xmlns="http://www.loc.gov/standards/alto/ns-v4#"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.loc.gov/standards/alto/ns-v4# http://www.loc.gov/standards/alto/v4/alto-4-0.xsd"
    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
    <Layout>
        <Page ID="P1" PHYSICAL_IMG_NR="1" HEIGHT="1469" WIDTH="1003" PRINTED_IMG_NR="1" PC="0.867">
            <PrintSpace ID="P1_PS00001" HPOS="86" VPOS="131" WIDTH="1500" HEIGHT="1131">
                <TextBlock ID="P1_TB00001" HPOS="200" VPOS="200" WIDTH="1000" HEIGHT="50">
                    <TextLine ID="P1_TL00001" HPOS="230" VPOS="216" WIDTH="987" HEIGHT="31">
                        <String ID="P1_ST00001" CONTENT="Marne" WC="0.99" HPOS="230" VPOS="223" WIDTH="50" HEIGHT="24">

                            <!-- outlined different options for the character "M" -->
                            <Glyph ID="P1_ST00001_G01" CONTENT="M" HPOS="244" VPOS="223" WIDTH="9" HEIGHT="24" GC="0.8">
                                <Variant CONTENT="H" VC="0.5"/>
                                <Variant CONTENT="N" VC="0.1"/>
                            </Glyph>
                            
                        </String>
                        <String ID="P1_ST00002" CONTENT="Home" WC="0.99" HPOS="230" VPOS="223" WIDTH="50" HEIGHT="24">
                            
                            <Glyph ID="P1_ST00002_G01" CONTENT="H" HPOS="230" VPOS="223" WIDTH="14" HEIGHT="24" GC="0.7">
                                <Variant CONTENT="M" VC="0.2"/>
                            </Glyph>
                        </String>
                    </TextLine>
                </TextBlock>
            </PrintSpace>
        </Page>
    </Layout>
</alto>
